item.title: Feds Will No Longer Use Your Tax Dollars To Do Experiments On Aborted Babies’ Bodies
item.description: For pro-lifers the NIH’s decision is a payoff on their decades-long lobbying effort to end taxpayer-funded experiments involving aborted babies.

item.title: Feds Arrest Anti-ICE Agitators Over ‘Coordinated Attack’ On Minnesota Church
item.description: Two anti-ICE activists have been arrested for their alleged roles in barnstorming a Minnesota-based church, federal authorities announced Thursday. In...

item.title: Trump Needs To Emulate One Of His Favorite Presidents To Crush The Blatant Insurrection In Minnesota
item.description: Trump has a momentous choice ahead of him: stand firm against chaos or allow the situation to spiral out of control.

item.title: SCOTUS Sends Mixed Signals On Trump’s Removal Of Federal Reserve Member
item.description: 'I don't see how the front-line position really can be ... the final position without ... kind of tilting the balance here too far the other direction...

item.title: Here’s Where J.D. Vance And Pro-Lifers Should Compromise, And Where They Shouldn’t
item.description: Pro-lifers should realize how little political power they have, and to take the modest wins for life that this administration can offer.
